body.value:
• Instituto de Música Sion. Perform Customer Service (Summer 2010 and 2011).
  • Grupo Sur. Accounting Assistant, Internship (September 2013).
  • IBM Costa Rica as Internal Auditor over operations. From October 2014 to November 2015. 
  • Cures and Curiosities with a J1 Student Program in Keystone, Colorado. From December 2015 to March 2016. Perform Assistant Manager role.
  • Cures and Curiosities with a J1 Student Program in Keystone, Colorado. From December 2016 to March 2017. Perform Store Supervisor role.
